consent.pageDescription: Your privacy and communication preferences matter to us. Learn about how we use SMS and phone communications.

hero.title: Communication Consent
hero.subtitle: Transparent. Secure. Respectful.
hero.description: At FTTG AutoTech, we believe in clear communication and respecting your privacy preferences.

content.value: When you provide your phone number and consent to SMS communications, we collect:

items: Your phone number for service-related communications
Your name for personalized messages
Service appointment details for confirmations and reminders
Location information for mobile service coordination
Communication preferences and opt-in/opt-out status

content.value: We use your phone number and information exclusively for:

items: Appointment confirmations and scheduling updates
Service reminders and follow-up communications
Emergency assistance and urgent service notifications
Service completion notifications and feedback requests
Two-way communication for service-related questions

content.value: We will NEVER use your information for spam, marketing to third parties, or non-service related communications without explicit consent.
You have complete control over your communication preferences:

items: Opt out at any time by replying 'STOP' to any SMS
Opt back in by replying 'START' or 'YES' to our number
Change your preferences by contacting us directly
Request deletion of your phone number from our records
Ask questions about how your information is used
Message frequency varies based on your service appointments
Typically 1-3 messages per service appointment
No more than 2 reminder messages per month unless requested
Emergency or urgent messages as needed for your safety
Standard message and data rates may apply from your carrier

content.value: FTTG AutoTech does not charge for SMS messages, but your mobile carrier's standard rates apply.

items: Encrypted transmission and storage of all phone numbers
Access limited to authorized FTTG AutoTech staff only
Regular security audits and updates
Compliance with telecommunications privacy laws
Secure deletion of data upon request

items.title: Full SMS Communication
items.description: Receive appointment confirmations, reminders, and service updates via SMS

items.title: Essential Communications Only
items.description: Receive only critical appointment confirmations and emergency communications

items.title: Voice Calls Only
items.description: Prefer phone calls over SMS for all communications

items.title: No SMS/Phone Marketing
items.description: Contact via email only, except for emergency situations

contact.title: Questions About Communication Consent?
contact.description: We're here to help clarify any questions about how we communicate with you.

content.value: By providing your phone number and consenting to SMS communications, you agree to receive text messages from FTTG AutoTech. This consent is not required to purchase services.
Message and data rates may apply. Message frequency varies. Reply STOP to opt out or HELP for help.
For customer service, call +1 (855) 578-4334 or email support@fttgautotech.com
